text: (Dauda) naagamba nti: mazima akuyisizza bubi bwakusabye endiga yo agigatte ku ndigaze, ate nga bangi mu bagatta emirimu basobya bannaabwe, okugyako abo abakkiriza nebakola emirimu emirongoofu wabula ate abo batono, Dauda naamanya nti mazima tumugezesezza neyeegayirira Mukama omulabiriziwe naakutama ku maviivi neyeemenya era nadda eri Katonda
